metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0502 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.31 and earlier and 5.6.11 andearlier allows remote authenticated users to affect availability viaunknown vectors related to Optimizer.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
